## ICredentialStatus type

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Veramo plugin interface for plugins implementing both the [manager](./core.icredentialstatusmanager.md) and the [verifier](./core.icredentialstatusverifier.md) aspects of Credential Status flow.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ICredentialStatus = ICredentialStatusVerifier & ICredentialStatusManager
```

<b>References:</b> [ICredentialStatusVerifier](./core.icredentialstatusverifier.md), [ICredentialStatusManager](./core.icredentialstatusmanager.md)
